member.summary: Gets or sets the rendering mode for the display

member.summary: Event is fired when has changed

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Implementation.Internal.ICog3DDisplayV2Impl.MouseCoordinates

member.summary: Renders the contents of the display to a PNG with the given resolution.

The given height.
The path of the PNG file

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Implementation.Internal.ICog3DDisplayV2Impl.RemoveGraphic(System.Int64)
member.summary: Removes the Cog3DGraphicBase object from the display
member.note: If the graphic is a then all of the dependent will be removed too.
member.param: the key of the graphic to be removed

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Implementation.Internal.ICog3DDisplayV2Impl.UpdateGeometryGraphic(System.Int64,Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase,Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DTransform)
member.summary: Updates the Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase object on the display
member.param: the key of the graphic on the display
the Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase to update
the transofrm to be used on the shape (map the vertices from the selected space name 3d of the shape to the displays displaySpaceName3D)
the transofrm to be used on the geometry graphics to map the vertices from the SelectedSpaceName3D of the graphic to the display's displaySpaceName3D

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Implementation.Internal.ICog3DDisplayV2Impl.AddGeometryGraphic(System.Int64,Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase,Cognex.VisionPro3D.ICog3DTransform)
member.summary: Adds a Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase to the display
member.param: the key of the group to add the Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase to
the ICog3DShapeGraphic to add
the transofrm to be used on the geometry graphics to map the vertices from the SelectedSpaceName3D of the graphic to the display's displaySpaceName3D
member.returns: the unique identifier of the graphic in the display

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Implementation.Internal.ICog3DDisplayV2Impl.ResetView
member.summary: Resets the view to the default initial camera position and view direction. Looking at the scene from the top along the Z axis in a way to fit the whole scene

member.summary: This enum defines the available display modes for rendering 3D content

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBuffer
member.summary: This class is a helper class to initialize the low level 3D graphic buffer

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicFactory.CreateMultiple(Cognex.VisionPro.CogVisionDataContainer,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Creates a list of Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase graphic wrappers from the CogVisionDataContainer input if it is supported. In case the input type is not supported, it return null or throws a NotSupportedException based on the value of the throwIfNotSupported argument. The following CogVisionDataContainers are supported:
If it is a flat CogVisionDataContainer and all of its entries are .
If its entries are CogVisionDataContainer themselves and each of those elements contains in turn exactly one and one .

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicFactory.Create(Cognex.VisionPro.ICogVisionData,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Creates a Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase graphic wrapper from the ICogVisionData input if it is supported. In case the input type is not supported, it returns null or throws a NotSupportedException based on the value of the throwIfNotSupported argument. The following types are supported:
if the followings are true:
It has one or many entries. In this case the first one will be used to create a from it.
It has exactly one and one . In this case the both of them will be used to create a that has grey overlay set.
The collection contains at least one element that is itself a CogVisionDataContainer, and that element contains in turn exactly one CogImage16Range and one CogImage16Grey. In this case the first RangeImage and its grey pair will be used to create a that has grey overlay set.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicFactory
member.summary: This class is a 3D graphic factory class that can create the graphic wrapper for ICogVisionData, Shapes, etc.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DShapeGraphicBase.DisplayState
member.summary: Gets/sets the DisplayState for this graphic object. The default value is Cog3DDisplayStateConstants::DisplayDefault. It can be used to force an object to be always rendered as WireFrame or Vertices regardless of what the display settings are for rendering.
member.value: The DisplayState of this graphic object.
member.exception: If setting the DisplayState to anything other than Surface, SurfaceWithWireFrame, WireFreame DisplayState of a Cog3DShapeGeometryGraphic cannot be set to DisplayDefault or Vertices. The individual derived classes may override this restriction.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flags may be affected:

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGeometryGraphicBase

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DRangeImageGraphic.ShowGreyImage
member.summary: Gets/sets whether the grey data should be shown during rendering for coloring the object The default value is true. NOTE: only has an effect when the GreyImage is available

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flags may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DRangeImageGraphic.RangeWithGrey
member.summary: Returns whether the grey data is available with the RangeImage constructor.

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DRangeImageGraphic.GreyImage
member.summary: Gets the grey-scale pair of the range image (if available)

member.summary: Gets the RangeImage object of the Cog3DGraphicImage16Range object

member.summary: Constructor that takes a CogImage16Range and a CogImage16Grey pair

member.param: The Cog3DRangeImageGraphic to be used as 3D Graphic.

member.name: E:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase.CoordinateSpaceTree3DChanged

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DVisionDataGraphicBase
member.summary: This file defines the base class 3D VisionDataGraphic objects It inherits from class

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase.DisplayState
member.summary: Gets/sets the DisplayState for this graphic object. It can be used to force an object to be always rendered as WireFrame or Vertices regardless of what the display settings are for rendering.
member.value: The DisplayState of this graphic object.
member.exception: If a DisplayState other than DisplayDefault, Surface, SurfaceWithWireFrame, WireFreame or Vertices

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flags may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase.MarkerSize
member.summary: Gets/sets the MarkerSize for this graphic object in screen units. Applies only if rendered as vertices The default value is 1.0.
member.value: The MarkerSize of this graphic object in screen units.
member.exception: The MarkerSize for graphic objects must be greaer than 0.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flags may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase.LineWidth
member.summary: Gets/sets the LineWidth for this graphic object in screen units. Applies only if rendered as WireFrame or SurfaceWithWireFrame. The default value is 1.
member.value: The LineWidth of this graphic object in screen units.
member.exception: The LineWidth for graphic objects must be greater or equal 1.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flags may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase.Visible
member.summary: Gets/sets the Visibility for this graphic object. The default value is true.
member.value: The Visibility of this graphic object.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flags may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase.Opacity
member.summary: Gets/sets the Opacity for this graphic object. The value range is 0.0 - 1.0, where 0.0 means full transparent and value 1.0 means full opaque. The default value is 1.0.
member.value: The Opacity of this graphic object. Must be between 0 and 1.
member.exception: The Opacity for graphic objects must be between 0 and 1.

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flags may be affected:

member.name: P:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase.Color
member.summary: Gets/sets the Color for this graphic object.
member.value: The Color of this craphic object.
member.exception: Color cannot be set to CogColorConstants::None

event.para: Fires when this property changes.
The following state flags may be affected:

member.name: M:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase.RealEqual(Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase,Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase,System.Double)
member.summary: Compares two Cog3DGraphicBase for equality.
member.param: First instance of a Cog3DGraphicBase to compare to the other.
Second instance of a Cog3DGraphicBase to compare to the other.
Tolerance when comparing number values for equality.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase.SfDisplayState
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by DisplayState may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase.SfMarkerSize
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by MarkerSize may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase.SfLineWidth
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by LineWidth may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase.SfVisible
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by Visible may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase.SfOpacity
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by Opacity may have changed.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase.SfColor
member.summary: This bit will be set in the EventArgs of a Changed event every time the value returned by Color may have changed.

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicBase
member.summary: This file defines the base class for 3D graphics objects

member.name: T:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicDisplayStateConstants
member.summary: This enum defines the available display states for 3D graphics. The graphic's display state defines the way of rendering of a 3D graphics.

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicDisplayStateConstants.Vertices
member.summary: The graphic's vertices will always be rendered

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicDisplayStateConstants.WireFrame
member.summary: The graphic's wireframe will always be rendered

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicDisplayStateConstants.SurfaceWithWireFrame
member.summary: The graphic's surface and wireframe will always be rendered

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicDisplayStateConstants.Surface
member.summary: The graphic's surface will always be rendered

member.name: F:Cognex.VisionPro3D.Cog3DGraphicDisplayStateConstants.DisplayDefault
member.summary: The graphic will follow the rendering mode of the display. Available for ICogVisionDataGraphic only
